name: Four Knight's of the Apocalypse, Horsemen of Pestilence
text: When a monster your opponent controls is destroyed: Inflict damage equal to that monsters original ATK to your opponent's Life Points. When a monster(s) is summoned: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent's Life Points. When your opponent activates a Spell or Trap: inflict 1000 damage to your opponent's Life Points.
